explanation: [0-0] IShowSpeed and Receba are standing face to face, both with their hands raised in front of their chests. Both have short black hair and are wearing black boxing gloves. IShowSpeed is wearing a dark blue top, his gloves decorated with white patterns and black text. Receba is wearing a black short-sleeved top with white trim on the collar and cuffs, his gloves have golden patterns and black text. Above the boxing ring are beams, surrounded by a metal structure. White lights illuminate the ring, and the ground is grayish-white. Below the image, there are white subtitles: "ISHOWSPEED VS RECEBA."

[0-3] Immediately afterward, Receba looks at IShowSpeed and shakes his hands a few times in front of his chest. Then the camera switches to the inside of the boxing ring. IShowSpeed, wearing a blue tracksuit, is squatting barefoot on the ground, supporting himself with his hands. There are black letters and patterns on the ground. Behind IShowSpeed, there is a black mesh fence. On the field outside the fence, two other boxers are fighting. There are white挡板s beside them, with black text and patterns on the boards.

[3-13] Then the camera switches, IShowSpeed and Receba extend their arms and approach each other towards the middle of the boxing ring. A referee wearing a black short-sleeved T-shirt and black shorts stands beside them. The audience sits in the stands outside the fence. After the boxers lightly touch each other's fists, Receba throws a left hook at IShowSpeed. IShowSpeed quickly dodges. Next, Receba's punch and IShowSpeed's dodge are replayed three times in slow motion from different angles. Finally, IShowSpeed lies on the ground and makes a celebratory gesture. The referee holds a red cup in his left hand, gestures with his right hand, and walks forward while talking. A man in black shorts and a black short-sleeved shirt stands by the fence with his right hand on his waist, and beside him are people taking pictures with their phones.
